title: Five-Star Oman Pool Suite Retreat with Private Beach, Three Restaurants & Award-Winning Spa
description: Arrive to the award-winning Six Senses Zighy Bay - the ultimate peninsular paradise. Cradled by the towering Hajar Mountains and opal blue waters of the Musandam's fjords, this five-star boutique escape aims to redefine exceptional experiences, offering total privacy on a pristine strip of beach. Foodies will savour the resortâ€™s exceptional restaurants - covering Middle Eastern delights and international favourites from locally sourced, seasonal ingredients - and dial up the romance with onsite destination dining options, such as a private dinner for two by the bay or dining in the comfort of your own villa. For a spot of pampering, sink into bliss at the onsite wellness spa where a range of traditional healing treatments will transport you to nirvana.
